issues.description: The template’s Lecture class declares attributes lectureName and numberOfInscribedStudents as public, but the UML in the problem statement marks all attributes as private (–). The solution also uses private fields. This visibility mismatch may confuse students about the intended encapsulation and the use of getters/setters.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of the existing fields in the template to private (and have students add the remaining private fields) so that all attributes match the UML’s private access level.
